svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

name="ページ1" id="ek80WE5hRV7WH4Pw9A0r"> <mxGraphModel dx="391" dy="-414" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-1" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="970" y="1290" width="510" height="810" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-4" value="ENV 命令の疑問" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1116" y="1300" width="250" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-18" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1010.5" y="1350" width="429.5" height="470" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-19" value="#Dockerfile" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1020" y="1360" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-20" value="FROM &nbsp; ubuntu:latest" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1045" y="1390" width="195" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-23" value="ENV &nbsp; val1=hello&nbsp;" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1043.5" y="1440" width="96.5" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-25" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=light-dark(#FF0000,#FF0000);strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1038.5" y="1440" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-29" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#000000;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1002.88" y="1870" width="444.75" height="205" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-30" value="[プロンプト] &nbsp; docker &nbsp; build &nbsp; -t &nbsp; test &nbsp; ." style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#00FF00;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1020" y="1875" width="220" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-31" value="[プロンプト] &nbsp; docker &nbsp; run &nbsp; &nbsp;test" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#00FF00;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1021" y="1915" width="220" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-37" value="" style="shape=flexArrow;endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-18" target="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-29"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1190" y="1730" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1240" y="1680" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-44" value="RUN &nbsp; ["adduser", &nbsp; "test"]" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1045" y="1510" width="145" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-50" value="val1=hello" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#00FF00;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1021" y="1955" width="109" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-51" value="val2=world" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#00FF00;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1020" y="1995" width="109" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Mz75FZkCzd6CILaA9amq-52" value="PATH,HOMEなど他の環境変数も出力される"
